name: End Zone Runner (Prototype)
description:
END ZONE RUNNER is an action/runner game with a 16-bit art style! Your goal is to survive and score points by jumping over enemies. Your opponents will have various attack patterns so use power ups to activate BIG BOI MODE and SMASH them for extra points. How long can you last??

Please provide feedback!

I would love to hear your feedback on this game so if you can take this super-quick survey it would be huge for the development of this prototype. You can find a link to the survey here: https://t.co/eNbkS4SFXT?amp=1 

How to Play

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Moves the player left and right
Space Bar - Jump
Power Up Pill - Activates BIG BOI MODE

How to Win

Score Points by JUMPING OVER your opponents!
Each enemy has a different attack pattern so pay attention to jersey colours!
If you're not in BIG BOI MODE then ONE HIT MEANS GAME OVER. 
In BIG BOI MODE you can SMASH ALL OPPONENTS for extra points!
Beware: BIG BOI MODE does not last forever!

Follow me!

Tweet a screenshot of your highest score to @elbowdropgames
